title: Is there a way to recover LoL or at least make it download faster?
body: I accidentally deleted LoL earlier today because it wasn't starting. I've been re-downloading it for the past 2 hours and it's still only at 40%. Is there a way to either recover my old LoL launcher or download faster?

replies.body: Oh noes! Sadly we don't have a way to make League download quicker after an uninstall. You could always try using a hardwired connection while it's download, and also I'd suggest [**configuring your DNS settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) to see if you can get a clearer connection to our servers too. That should at least be able to get the download going a little faster!
